review_text: Good course, very informative and straight-forward.  The music intro for each section got a little repetitive, but overall I enjoyed this course a lot.

I love watching people who are experts in their art form and he certainly is that! And he is a great teacher as well. However, the course is FULL of repetition of a few techniques.  Everything I gleaned in this course was covered in the first module.

Many thanks! Very informative course, definitely recommend!
I look forward to your other courses :)
I loved the course and learned amazing retouching techniques! Highly recommend it!. Thank you, Aaron, for passing on your knowledge!!!
Super Informative and Details.

A good course on using some photoshop tools. Very nice to watch the 3 tutorials and to see Aaron at work. The videos are a bit long and repetitive, but at least the mechanisms and the suggestions enter the working process :)
Recommended, but not as a first choice compared to other his video!

This is a best course I ever had in my life, I've learned a lot of important things about retouching. Highly recommend for anyone those who need to become expert in portrait retouching. love the course......!
It's an excellent course. I have learned a lot of new things thank you.
Very interesting and fully impressive of information
loving it! Thank you

I was doing frequency separation for a long time. But surprisingly this course helped me to get to know about a different and more advanced method. Aaron is a great instructor with a pleasant and clear teaching method. I have followed few of the fiverr learn courses. Honestly all of them helped me to improve my skills. Hope to follow few others in this month.
great course. very informative
i rely enjoy in this course its a good course you should take it

I found this course helpful in so many ways. It walks you through all of the techniques and you can learn at your own pace. I liked how it repeated the techniques on different example images so you can get a feel of how the frequency separation works in lots of different scenarios.
very informative
nice courses .. but some background noice
Pretty well explained in depth. An easy to learn technique that makes my workflow a lot smoother.
really good content, very good, a best tutorial for the skin retouching
Love the content on this course!
Its really Awesome.  I learn many of thing from this tutorial.
Extremely valuable for retouching portraits and headshots! This course is comprehensive and easy to understand. It was extremely helpful to me, thank you very much! Highly recommend!
I am so happy
